t looks like Kenzo picked

red away and we are

  is that it's a small female bot.

  I know you'd rather=
 be out doing something that involves some
  exercise, rather than standing=
 there and scanning the horizon.  I'll
  update you when I have more inform=
ation.  Perseus out."

  Lord Perseus sat back and waited for a reponse.
